steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I click on link 'Advanced Search' on panel 'Quick Search'
I click on tab "Literature" on page 'Advanced Search'
I click on image 'List' in row 3 on page 'Literature' under 'Advanced Search'
I enter text "clinical" in input box on panel 'Advanced Search' pop-up
I click button 'Search' on 'Advanced Search' pop-up

substeps.message: Clicked on term Aging Clinical and Experimental Research

steps.title: I select term "Aging Clinical and Experimental Research" from 'Select from those listed below' box on pop-up 'Advanced Search'
I click on button 'Apply' on pop-up 'Advanced Search'
I click button 'Search' on 'Advanced Search' page
I click on button 'Table view' on page 'Results'
I click on "random" report link from the results table
I click on link 'Export' on page 'Report'
I select radio-button "PDF" on report export step 'Choose Document Format'
I click on button 'Next' on report export window
I click on button 'Export' on report export window
